018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter;
019
020import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
021import static org.junit.Assert.fail;
022
023import java.nio.charset.Charset;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.LinkedList;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.TreeSet;
028import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
029import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
030import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CompareOperator;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.DoNotRetryIOException;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseCommonTestingUtility;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseConfiguration;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.FilterTests;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.MediumTests;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.ClassLoaderTestHelper;
041import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.EnvironmentEdgeManager;
042import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Pair;
043import org.junit.AfterClass;
044import org.junit.ClassRule;
045import org.junit.Test;
046import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
047import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
048import org.junit.runners.Parameterized;
049
050import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.ProtobufUtil;
051import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.FilterProtos;
052
053@RunWith(Parameterized.class)
054@Category({ FilterTests.class, MediumTests.class })
055public class TestFilterSerialization {
056
057  @ClassRule
058  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
059    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestFilterSerialization.class);
060
061  @Parameterized.Parameter(0)
062  public boolean allowFastReflectionFallthrough;
063
064  @Parameterized.Parameters(name = "{index}: allowFastReflectionFallthrough={0}")
065  public static Iterable<Object[]> data() {
066    return HBaseCommonTestingUtility.BOOLEAN_PARAMETERIZED;
067  }
068
069  @AfterClass
070  public static void afterClass() throws Exception {
071    // set back to true so that it doesn't affect any other tests
072    ProtobufUtil.setAllowFastReflectionFallthrough(true);
073  }
074
075  @Test
076  public void testColumnCountGetFilter() throws Exception {
077    ColumnCountGetFilter columnCountGetFilter = new ColumnCountGetFilter(1);
078    assertTrue(columnCountGetFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
079      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnCountGetFilter))));
080  }
081
082  @Test
083  public void testColumnPaginationFilter() throws Exception {
084    ColumnPaginationFilter columnPaginationFilter = new ColumnPaginationFilter(1, 7);
085    assertTrue(columnPaginationFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
086      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnPaginationFilter))));
087  }
088
089  @Test
090  public void testColumnPrefixFilter() throws Exception {
091    // empty string
092    ColumnPrefixFilter columnPrefixFilter = new ColumnPrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes(""));
093    assertTrue(columnPrefixFilter
094      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnPrefixFilter))));
095
096    // non-empty string
097    columnPrefixFilter = new ColumnPrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes(""));
098    assertTrue(columnPrefixFilter
099      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnPrefixFilter))));
100  }
101
102  @Test
103  public void testColumnRangeFilter() throws Exception {
104    // null columns
105    ColumnRangeFilter columnRangeFilter = new ColumnRangeFilter(null, true, null, false);
106    assertTrue(columnRangeFilter
107      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnRangeFilter))));
108
109    // non-null columns
110    columnRangeFilter = new ColumnRangeFilter(Bytes.toBytes("a"), false, Bytes.toBytes("b"), true);
111    assertTrue(columnRangeFilter
112      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnRangeFilter))));
113  }
114
115  @Test
116  public void testDependentColumnFilter() throws Exception {
117    // null column qualifier/family
118    DependentColumnFilter dependentColumnFilter = new DependentColumnFilter(null, null);
119    assertTrue(dependentColumnFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
120      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(dependentColumnFilter))));
121
122    // non-null column qualifier/family
123    dependentColumnFilter = new DependentColumnFilter(Bytes.toBytes("family"),
124      Bytes.toBytes("qual"), true, CompareOperator.GREATER_OR_EQUAL,
125      new BitComparator(Bytes.toBytes("bitComparator"), BitComparator.BitwiseOp.OR));
126    assertTrue(dependentColumnFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
127      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(dependentColumnFilter))));
128  }
129
130  @Test
131  public void testFamilyFilter() throws Exception {
132    FamilyFilter familyFilter = new FamilyFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL,
133      new BinaryPrefixComparator(Bytes.toBytes("testValueOne")));
134    assertTrue(familyFilter
135      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(familyFilter))));
136  }
137
138  @Test
139  public void testFilterList() throws Exception {
140    // empty filter list
141    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(new LinkedList<>());
142    assertTrue(filterList
143      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filterList))));
144
145    // non-empty filter list
146    LinkedList<Filter> list = new LinkedList<>();
147    list.add(new ColumnCountGetFilter(1));
148    list.add(new RowFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL, new SubstringComparator("testFilterList")));
149    assertTrue(filterList
150      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filterList))));
151  }
152
153  @Test
154  public void testFilterWrapper() throws Exception {
155    FilterWrapper filterWrapper =
156      new FilterWrapper(new ColumnRangeFilter(Bytes.toBytes("e"), false, Bytes.toBytes("f"), true));
157    assertTrue(filterWrapper
158      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filterWrapper))));
159  }
160
161  @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
162  @Test
163  public void testFirstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter() throws Exception {
164    // empty qualifiers set
165    TreeSet<byte[]> set = new TreeSet<>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
166    FirstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter firstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter =
167      new FirstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter(set);
168    assertTrue(firstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
169      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(firstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter))));
170
171    // non-empty qualifiers set
172    set.add(Bytes.toBytes("col0"));
173    set.add(Bytes.toBytes("col1"));
174    firstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter = new FirstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter(set);
175    assertTrue(firstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
176      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(firstKeyValueMatchingQualifiersFilter))));
177  }
178
179  @Test
180  public void testFirstKeyOnlyFilter() throws Exception {
181    FirstKeyOnlyFilter firstKeyOnlyFilter = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
182    assertTrue(firstKeyOnlyFilter
183      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(firstKeyOnlyFilter))));
184  }
185
186  @Test
187  public void testFuzzyRowFilter() throws Exception {
188    LinkedList<Pair<byte[], byte[]>> fuzzyList = new LinkedList<>();
189    fuzzyList.add(new Pair<>(Bytes.toBytes("999"), new byte[] { 0, 0, 1 }));
190    fuzzyList.add(new Pair<>(Bytes.toBytes("abcd"), new byte[] { 1, 0, 1, 1 }));
191    FuzzyRowFilter fuzzyRowFilter = new FuzzyRowFilter(fuzzyList);
192    assertTrue(fuzzyRowFilter
193      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(fuzzyRowFilter))));
194  }
195
196  @Test
197  public void testInclusiveStopFilter() throws Exception {
198    // InclusveStopFilter with null stopRowKey
199    InclusiveStopFilter inclusiveStopFilter = new InclusiveStopFilter(null);
200    assertTrue(inclusiveStopFilter
201      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(inclusiveStopFilter))));
202
203    // InclusveStopFilter with non-null stopRowKey
204    inclusiveStopFilter = new InclusiveStopFilter(Bytes.toBytes("inclusiveStopFilter"));
205    assertTrue(inclusiveStopFilter
206      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(inclusiveStopFilter))));
207  }
208
209  @Test
210  public void testKeyOnlyFilter() throws Exception {
211    // KeyOnlyFilter with lenAsVal
212    KeyOnlyFilter keyOnlyFilter = new KeyOnlyFilter(true);
213    assertTrue(keyOnlyFilter
214      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(keyOnlyFilter))));
215
216    // KeyOnlyFilter without lenAsVal
217    keyOnlyFilter = new KeyOnlyFilter();
218    assertTrue(keyOnlyFilter
219      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(keyOnlyFilter))));
220  }
221
222  @Test
223  public void testMultipleColumnPrefixFilter() throws Exception {
224    // empty array
225    byte[][] prefixes = null;
226    MultipleColumnPrefixFilter multipleColumnPrefixFilter =
227      new MultipleColumnPrefixFilter(prefixes);
228    assertTrue(multipleColumnPrefixFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
229      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(multipleColumnPrefixFilter))));
230
231    // non-empty array
232    prefixes = new byte[2][];
233    prefixes[0] = Bytes.toBytes("a");
234    prefixes[1] = Bytes.toBytes("");
235    multipleColumnPrefixFilter = new MultipleColumnPrefixFilter(prefixes);
236    assertTrue(multipleColumnPrefixFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
237      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(multipleColumnPrefixFilter))));
238  }
239
240  @Test
241  public void testPageFilter() throws Exception {
242    PageFilter pageFilter = new PageFilter(6);
243    assertTrue(pageFilter
244      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(pageFilter))));
245  }
246
247  @Test
248  public void testPrefixFilter() throws Exception {
249    // null prefix
250    PrefixFilter prefixFilter = new PrefixFilter(null);
251    assertTrue(prefixFilter
252      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(prefixFilter))));
253
254    // non-null prefix
255    prefixFilter = new PrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes("abc"));
256    assertTrue(prefixFilter
257      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(prefixFilter))));
258  }
259
260  @Test
261  public void testQualifierFilter() throws Exception {
262    QualifierFilter qualifierFilter =
263      new QualifierFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL, new NullComparator());
264    assertTrue(qualifierFilter
265      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(qualifierFilter))));
266  }
267
268  @Test
269  public void testRandomRowFilter() throws Exception {
270    RandomRowFilter randomRowFilter = new RandomRowFilter((float) 0.1);
271    assertTrue(randomRowFilter
272      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(randomRowFilter))));
273  }
274
275  @Test
276  public void testRowFilter() throws Exception {
277    RowFilter rowFilter =
278      new RowFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL, new SubstringComparator("testRowFilter"));
279    assertTrue(
280      rowFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(rowFilter))));
281  }
282
283  @Test
284  public void testSingleColumnValueExcludeFilter() throws Exception {
285    // null family/column SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter
286    SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter singleColumnValueExcludeFilter =
287      new SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter(null, null, CompareOperator.GREATER_OR_EQUAL,
288        Bytes.toBytes("value"));
289    assertTrue(singleColumnValueExcludeFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
290      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(singleColumnValueExcludeFilter))));
291
292    // non-null family/column SingleColumnValueFilter
293    singleColumnValueExcludeFilter = new SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter(Bytes.toBytes("fam"),
294      Bytes.toBytes("qual"), CompareOperator.LESS_OR_EQUAL, new NullComparator(), false, false);
295    assertTrue(singleColumnValueExcludeFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
296      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(singleColumnValueExcludeFilter))));
297  }
298
299  @Test
300  public void testSingleColumnValueFilter() throws Exception {
301    // null family/column SingleColumnValueFilter
302    SingleColumnValueFilter singleColumnValueFilter =
303      new SingleColumnValueFilter(null, null, CompareOperator.LESS, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
304    assertTrue(singleColumnValueFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
305      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(singleColumnValueFilter))));
306
307    // non-null family/column SingleColumnValueFilter
308    singleColumnValueFilter = new SingleColumnValueFilter(Bytes.toBytes("family"),
309      Bytes.toBytes("qualifier"), CompareOperator.NOT_EQUAL, new NullComparator(), true, true);
310    assertTrue(singleColumnValueFilter.areSerializedFieldsEqual(
311      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(singleColumnValueFilter))));
312  }
313
314  @Test
315  public void testSkipFilter() throws Exception {
316    SkipFilter skipFilter = new SkipFilter(new PageFilter(6));
317    assertTrue(skipFilter
318      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(skipFilter))));
319  }
320
321  @Test
322  public void testTimestampsFilter() throws Exception {
323    // Empty timestamp list
324    TimestampsFilter timestampsFilter = new TimestampsFilter(new LinkedList<>());
325    assertTrue(timestampsFilter
326      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(timestampsFilter))));
327
328    // Non-empty timestamp list
329    LinkedList<Long> list = new LinkedList<>();
330    list.add(EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
331    list.add(EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
332    timestampsFilter = new TimestampsFilter(list);
333    assertTrue(timestampsFilter
334      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(timestampsFilter))));
335  }
336
337  @Test
338  public void testValueFilter() throws Exception {
339    ValueFilter valueFilter =
340      new ValueFilter(CompareOperator.NO_OP, new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes("testValueOne")));
341    assertTrue(valueFilter
342      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(valueFilter))));
343  }

345  @Test
346  public void testWhileMatchFilter() throws Exception {
347    WhileMatchFilter whileMatchFilter = new WhileMatchFilter(
348      new ColumnRangeFilter(Bytes.toBytes("c"), false, Bytes.toBytes("d"), true));
349    assertTrue(whileMatchFilter
350      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(whileMatchFilter))));
351  }
352
353  @Test
354  public void testMultiRowRangeFilter() throws Exception {
355    List<RowRange> ranges = new ArrayList<>();
356    ranges.add(new RowRange(Bytes.toBytes(30), true, Bytes.toBytes(40), false));
357    ranges.add(new RowRange(Bytes.toBytes(10), true, Bytes.toBytes(20), false));
358    ranges.add(new RowRange(Bytes.toBytes(60), true, Bytes.toBytes(70), false));
359
360    MultiRowRangeFilter multiRowRangeFilter = new MultiRowRangeFilter(ranges);
361    assertTrue(multiRowRangeFilter
362      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(multiRowRangeFilter))));
363  }
364
365  @Test
366  public void testColumnValueFilter() throws Exception {
367    ColumnValueFilter columnValueFilter = new ColumnValueFilter(Bytes.toBytes("family"),
368      Bytes.toBytes("qualifier"), CompareOperator.EQUAL, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
369    assertTrue(columnValueFilter
370      .areSerializedFieldsEqual(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(columnValueFilter))));
371  }
372
373  /**
374   * Test that we can load and deserialize custom filters. Good to have generally, but also proves
375   * that this still works after HBASE-27276 despite not going through our fast function caches.
376   */
377  @Test
378  public void testCustomFilter() throws Exception {
379    Filter baseFilter = new PrefixFilter("foo".getBytes());
380    FilterProtos.Filter filterProto = ProtobufUtil.toFilter(baseFilter);
381    String suffix = "" + System.currentTimeMillis() + allowFastReflectionFallthrough;
382    String className = "CustomLoadedFilter" + suffix;
383    filterProto = filterProto.toBuilder().setName(className).build();
384
385    Configuration conf = HBaseConfiguration.create();
386    HBaseTestingUtility testUtil = new HBaseTestingUtility();
387    String dataTestDir = testUtil.getDataTestDir().toString();
388
389    // First make sure the test bed is clean, delete any pre-existing class.
390    // Below toComparator call is expected to fail because the comparator is not loaded now
391    ClassLoaderTestHelper.deleteClass(className, dataTestDir, conf);
392    try {
393      Filter filter = ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filterProto);
394      fail("expected to fail");
395    } catch (DoNotRetryIOException e) {
396      // do nothing, this is expected
397    }
398
399    // Write a jar to be loaded into the classloader
400    String code =
401      IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResourceAsStream("/CustomLoadedFilter.java.template"),
402        Charset.defaultCharset()).replaceAll("\\$\\{suffix\\}", suffix);
403    ClassLoaderTestHelper.buildJar(dataTestDir, className, code,
404      ClassLoaderTestHelper.localDirPath(conf));
405
406    // Disallow fallthrough at first. We expect below to fail because the custom filter is not
407    // available at initialization so not in the cache.
408    ProtobufUtil.setAllowFastReflectionFallthrough(false);
409    try {
410      ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filterProto);
411      fail("expected to fail");
412    } catch (DoNotRetryIOException e) {
413      // do nothing, this is expected
414    }
415
416    // Now the deserialization should pass with fallthrough enabled. This proves that custom
417    // filters can work despite not being supported by cache.
418    ProtobufUtil.setAllowFastReflectionFallthrough(true);
419    ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filterProto);
420
421  }
422
423}
